attributes.action: Apologise unreservedly to the Iranian people for the accidental intrusion of British servicemen into Iranian territory and promise to stay at least 2km from disputed and uncertain territorial limits in future.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We lost the initiative. Fifteen British subjects have been put at risk by their superiors not following set procedures. Diplomacy will not work, we are going to lose face anyway so do it now and get these unfortunate political pawns back home.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
